languages.text: В главном зале, покрытом коркой психического льда, на высоком троне застыл слепой мужчина в зеленой рясе. Он был буквально впаян в лед, но... еще жив. И он кричит.

The main hall was covered in a crust of psychic ice. A green-robed blind old man sat motionless upon a tall throne. He was quite literally embedded in the ice, yet... he was still alive. And screaming.
languages.original_text: В главном зале, покрытом коркой психического льда, на высоком троне застыл слепой мужчина в зеленой рясе. Он был буквально впаян в лед, но... еще жив. И он кричит.

languages.text: La sala principal estaba cubierta de hielo psíquico. Un hombre ciego de túnica verde permanecía inmóvil en un alto trono. Estaba completamente cubierto de hielo, y aun así... seguía con vida. Y gritaba.
languages.original_text: The main hall was covered in a crust of psychic ice. A green-robed blind old man sat motionless upon a tall throne. He was quite literally embedded in the ice, yet... he was still alive. And screaming.

traits.locale_text: La sala principal estaba cubierta de hielo psíquico. Un hombre ciego de túnica verde permanecía inmóvil en un alto trono. Estaba completamente cubierto de hielo, y aun así... seguía con vida.

languages.text: メインホールは、超能力による分厚い氷で覆われていた。緑のローブを着た盲目の老人が、背の高い王座にじっと座っている。男は文字通り、氷の中で固まっているのだが…まだ生きている。そして叫んでいた。
languages.original_text: The main hall was covered in a crust of psychic ice. A green-robed blind old man sat motionless upon a tall throne. He was quite literally embedded in the ice, yet... he was still alive. And screaming.

traits.locale_text: メインホールは、サイキックの分厚い氷で覆われていた。緑のローブを着た盲目の老人が、背の高い王座にじっと座っている。男は文字通り、氷の中で固まっているのだが…まだ生きている。

languages.text: 大厅覆满了灵能结成的冰层，一位身穿绿袍的年迈盲人一动不动地坐在高耸的宝座上。他整个人都被冰层盖得严严实实，但他……还活着，在放声尖叫。
languages.original_text: The main hall was covered in a crust of psychic ice. A green-robed blind old man sat motionless upon a tall throne. He was quite literally embedded in the ice, yet... he was still alive. And screaming.

traits.locale_text: 大厅覆满了灵能结成的冰层，一位身穿绿袍的老盲人一动不动地坐在高耸的宝座上。他整个人都被冰层盖得严严实实，但他……还活着。

languages.text: Die Haupthalle war mit einer Kruste aus psychischem Eis bedeckt. Ein blinder alter Mann in einer grünen Robe saß reglos auf einem hohen Thron. Er war buchstäblich in dem Eis eingeschlossen, aber ... noch am Leben. Und er schrie.
languages.original_text: The main hall was covered in a crust of psychic ice. A green-robed blind old man sat motionless upon a tall throne. He was quite literally embedded in the ice, yet... he was still alive. And screaming.

traits.locale_text: Die Haupthalle war mit einer Kruste aus psychischem Eis bedeckt. Ein blinder alter Mann in einer grünen Robe saß reglos auf einem hohen Thron. Er war buchstäblich in dem Eis eingeschlossen, aber ... noch am Leben.

languages.text: La salle principale était recouverte d'une gangue de glace psychique. Assis sur un grand trône, un vieil aveugle drapé dans une toge verte est littéralement figé dans la glace, et pourtant... il est toujours en vie. Et il hurle.
languages.original_text: The main hall was covered in a crust of psychic ice. A green-robed blind old man sat motionless upon a tall throne. He was quite literally embedded in the ice, yet... he was still alive. And screaming.

traits.locale_text: La salle principale était recouverte d'une gangue de glace psychique. Assis sur un grand trône, un vieil aveugle drapé dans une toge verte est littéralement figé dans la glace, et pourtant... il est toujours en vie.

languages.text: Ana salon, bir ruhsezi buzu tabakasıyla kaplanmış. Yeşil cübbeli kör bir ihtiyar, yüksek tahtın üstünde hareketsizce oturmuştu. Kelimenin tam anlamıyla buza gömülmüş bir hâlde olsa da... Hâlâ yaşıyordu. Çığlıkları da ona eşlik ediyordu.
languages.original_text: The main hall was covered in a crust of psychic ice. A green-robed blind old man sat motionless upon a tall throne. He was quite literally embedded in the ice, yet... he was still alive. And screaming.
